html 静态资源引用 自动判断 SSL or HTTPS

vuePress-theme-reco feeluo    2020

html 静态资源引用 自动判断 SSL or HTTPS

feeluo 2020-08-25 htmljshttps

引用

<script type="text/javascript" src="//www.demo.com/js/xx.js"></script>

<img src="//www.demo.com/images/logo.jpg"></a>
